tag.name: cfinvokeargument
tag.help: Passes the name and value of a parameter to a component method or a web service. This tag is used within the cfinvoke tag.

parameter.name: omit
parameter.help: Enables you to omit a parameter when invoking a web service. It is an error to specify omit="true" if the cfinvoke webservice attribute is not specified. - true: omit this parameter when invoking a web service. - false: do not omit this parameter when invoking a web service.
